Posts.Content: Feb 24, 2019 01:05PM Rbxx0520 wrote: Hi! I started my first round of CMF chemo last week and wanted to thank everyone for all the helpful advice about how to prep for it and what to expect. Such a scary experience so all the advice and encouragement on here was so very helpful and reassuring. Going for my second (of 8) round tomorrow. Wishing everyone of here all the best.
Posts.Title: CMF treatment survivors and experiences 19501952 2002chickadee
